title: Autobiography of Mrs. Fletcher.
author: Fletcher
snippet: Miss ^Jdgeworth and her two very agreeable sisters were pleased to meet at our house Sir Robert and Lady Listen. They accompanied us some days after this to dine at Millburn Tower, the Listons' country-house, near Edinburgh. Miss Edgeworth's varied information and quick repartee appeared to great advantage in conversation with the polished ex-ambassador of Constantinople,  who always reminded me of the couplet : —
